functions.title: BOE Vol 10
pages:
§lBane of Arthropods I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a spider eye as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lBane of Arthropods II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two spider eyes as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R R§r

§lBane of Arthropods III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a fermented spider eye as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
 R §r

§lBane of Arthropods IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two fermented spider eyes as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top and on the left (L).
§lLLL
LB 
R R§r

§lBane of Arthropods V:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two fermented spider eyes (R) and a web (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis along the the top and both sides (L).
§lLLL
LBL
RrR§r
